# Welcome to the Web Technologies Notes

Interesting Point

These notes are created using a static site generator called VuePress,and hosted for free on Google's cloud infrastructure, FireBase. Both Firebase and Vue are tools that demonstrate some of the latest Web Technologies.

# Engaging with the course content

Theses notes will host the week to week content for this course. The Unit SOL page will take care of:

Assessments
Reading Lists
Module Overview and Weekly Schedule

# Mock TCA

The mock TCA is now live, we will not be doing the mock TCA in class. The main TCA will take place on the week starting 25th Feb. The TCA will be two hours in length and will take place in your usual practical session.
